Tudu：A Thera．He was the teacher of Culla Kokālika and，having become an Anāgāmī，was born as a Pacceka Brahma in the Brahma-world．

When Kokālika was grievously ill，Tudu visited him and exhorted him to put his trust in Sāriputta and Moggallāna．But Kokālika refused to accept his advice and drove him away．
